h2_title: Black Myth: Wukong Thunderflame Seal Location
content: The Thunderflame Seal can be found randomly from any Lightning Mage within The New West. The best place to farm them is in the Valley of Ecstasy in Brook of Bliss.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Thunderflame_Seal.md', within the main section titled 'Thunderflame Seal', specifically from the subsection 'Black Myth: Wukong Thunderflame Seal Location'.
The content is as follows:
The Thunderflame Seal can be found randomly from any Lightning Mage within The New West. The best place to farm them is in the Valley of Ecstasy in Brook of Bliss.
